title: Nelson Mandela - Conversations with Myself (2010)
description:
Nelson Mandela - Conversations with Myself (Anchor, 2010)

ISBN: 9780374128951 | 454 pages | EPUB & MOBI


CONVERSATIONS WITH MYSELF draws on Nelson Mandela's personal archive of never-before-seen materials to offer unique access to the private world of an incomparable world leader.  Journals kept on the run during the anti-apartheid struggle of the early 1960s; diaries and draft letters written in Robben Island and other South African prisons during his twenty-seven years of incarceration; notebooks from the postapartheid transition; private recorded conversations; speeches and correspondence written during his presidency -- a historic collection of documents archived at the Nelson Mandela Foundation is brought together into a sweeping narrative of great immediacy and stunning power.  An intimate journey from Mandela's first stirrings of political consciousness to his galvanizing role on the world stage, Conversations with Myself illuminates a heroic life forged on the front lines of the struggle for freedom and justice.

Contains a Foreword by President Barack Obama.
